metadata.title: CVE-2020-13936 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker that is able to modify Velocity templates may execute arbitraryJava code or run arbitrary system commands with the same privileges as theaccount running the Servlet container. This applies to applications thatallow untrusted users to upload/modify velocity templates running ApacheVelocity Engine versions up to 2.2.

criterions.comment: velocity: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
